publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3617 Margaret Jamieson: Health Service Journal Management Awards 2002 - Primary Care Category-That the Parliament congratulates the Ayrshire and Arran Primary Care NHS Trust and East Ayrshire Council on winning the Primary Care Category of the Health Service Journal Management Awards 2002 for their innovative partnership project at Dalmellington and looks forward to further developments of this nature to improve the quality of life of citizens.

S1M-3617 Margaret Jamieson: Health Service Journal Management Awards 2002 - Primary Care Categoryâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Ayrshire and Arran Primary Care NHS Trust and East Ayrshire Council on winning the Primary Care Category of the Health Service Journal Management Awards 2002 for their innovative partnership project at Dalmellington and looks forward to further developments of this nature to improve the quality of life of citizens.
S1M-3617 Health Service Journal Management Awards 2002 - Primary Care Category (lodged on 21 November 2002) Scott Barrie*, Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-3617 Health Service Journal Management Awards 2002 - Primary Care Category (lodged on 21 November 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3617 Health Service Journal Management Awards 2002 - Primary Care Category (lodged on 21 November 2002) Janis Hughes*, Bristow Muldoon*, Helen Eadie*

S1M-3617 Health Service Journal Management Awards 2002 - Primary Care Category (lodged on 21 November 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3617 Health Service Journal Management Awards 2002 - Primary Care Category (lodged on 21 November 2002) Pauline McNeill*
